name: Bay of Kotor Exploration
description: Discover the Bay of Kotor, a UNESCO World Heritage site known for its stunning natural beauty and picturesque towns.

name: Visit the Ostrog Monastery
description: Experience the Ostrog Monastery, a significant Serbian Orthodox monastery carved into a cliff, attracting pilgrims and tourists alike.

name: Durmitor National Park Hiking
description: Explore Durmitor National Park, a UNESCO World Heritage site, offering stunning landscapes for hiking, rafting, and skiing.

name: Sveti Stefan Beach
description: Visit the iconic Sveti Stefan, a picturesque islet and resort, renowned for its beautiful beaches and historical significance.

name: Budva Old Town Visit
description: Stroll through Budva's Old Town, known for its medieval architecture, vibrant nightlife, and Adriatic Sea views.

name: Lovcen National Park Adventure
description: Discover Lovcen National Park, home to the Njegos Mausoleum and offering panoramic views of Montenegro.

name: Skadar Lake Boat Trip
description: Take a boat trip on Skadar Lake, the largest lake in the Balkans, known for its diverse ecosystem and birdlife.

name: Perast Small Town Exploration
description: Visit the charming coastal town of Perast, famous for its Baroque architecture and the nearby Our Lady of the Rocks islet.

name: Tara River Canyon Rafting
description: Experience rafting in the Tara River Canyon, one of the deepest river canyons in Europe, offering thrilling outdoor adventure.

name: Cetinje Historical Tour
description: Explore Cetinje, the historical capital of Montenegro, rich in cultural heritage and home to several museums and monasteries.
